      • fileToJson

        public static com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject fileToJson(java.lang.String path)
        reader json file and convert to JSONObject
        参数:
        path - the json's file path
        返回:
        a fastjson JSONObject

      • stringToFile

        public static void stringToFile(java.lang.String text,
                                java.lang.String path)
        write json String to a json file
        参数:
        text - the json text needs to write
        path - the json file path needs to save

      • getItem

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getItem(java.lang.String path,
                                                                       java.lang.String item)
        get item from json text file
        参数:
        path - the json file path
        item - the item you want to get, can be para, header
        返回:
        a Map, key is String, value is Object

      • jsonToHasMap

        Convert jsonobject to hashMap
        参数:
        object - the jsonObject need to convert
        返回:
        the hashMap(String, String)

      • getItemHasMap

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getItemHasMap(java.lang.String path,
                                                                                 java.lang.String item)
        get a certain item json value from file path and convert it to hashMap
        参数:
        path - the json file path
        item - the item of json
        返回:
        the hashMap(String, String)

      • pathToHashMap

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> pathToHashMap(java.lang.String path)
        convert upload file path to body hashMap
        参数:
        path - the file path
        返回:
        hasHMap which can be add into post/get function

      • StringToHashMap

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> StringToHashMap(java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String password,
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String authorization)
        converter account information to HashMap
        参数:
        username - the smms username
        password - the smms password
        authorization - the smms key
        返回:
        a hashMap, Key is String(username, password, authorization), Value is HashMap(para, header)
